title: Martin Van Buren National Historic Site: Kids & Youth
body: Kids & Youth         Newly sworn in Martin Van Buren Junior Rangers   Things to do. Exploration and Activities.  Martin Van Buren National Historic Site offers plenty for kids. Check out our Junior Ranger Program and the trading cards we offer! Who says politics can't be fun? Check out how to make a campaign token used in the 1840 presidential election. Want to be a Martin Van Buren NHS Super Scholar? Find out here. Be A Junior Ranger Park Fun
